<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter to the superiours, (whether bishops or priests) which approve or license the popish books in England particularly to those of the Jesuits order, concerning Lewis Sabran, a Jesuit. Gee, Edward, 1657-1730.
[2], 14 p.
Printed for William Rogers ..., London : 1688.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Attributed to Edward Gee. cf. NUC pre-1956. Signed at end: E.G.
=======
